message: Let's split it 4:1, a fair start to the game!
You're going to regret this, Alice!
You're not getting the better deal, Bob!
You're not getting it all, Bob!
You're running out of time, Alice!
You're not getting away that easily, Bob!
You're getting desperate, Alice. Last chance!
You're not getting it all, Bob! Not yet, at least...
This is my last offer, Alice. Take it or leave it!
